reporter_caption.center: O'BRIEN v. KENTUCKY BAR ASS'N., 790 S.W.2d 447 (Ky. 1990)

caption.center: David S. O'BRIEN, Petitioner, v. KENTUCKY BAR ASSOCIATION, Respondent.

opinion.attorneys:
David S. O'Brien, Louisville, for petitioner.
Bruce K. Davis, Kentucky Bar Ass'n, Frankfort, for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER OF REINSTATEMENT On recommendation of the Kentucky Bar Association, David S. O'Brien is hereby reinstated to the practice of law.
Mr. O'Brien shall pay the costs incurred by the Kentucky Bar Association in the processing of this application.
All concur.
